attributes.action: Require Parliament to debate a 'No Deal' as a UK exit route from the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Discussion and transparency of this potential exit route is essential to complete the spectrum of options available. With the exception of Theresa May the majority of the Westminster bubble claim 'No Deal' would be a cliff edge and a disaster.  What is the truth.
attributes.background: Some people suggest 'No Deal' is a practical solution to the present impasse regarding the UK exit from the EU.  The BBC, the Media and Parliament seem reluctant to explore or explain to the general public the mechanisms which would be involved and their practicality.
